div1.head: Photograph of “Das Deutsche Haus” Building in Indianapolis, Indiana, taken in 1905 where Walter Reed read his preliminary report on the etiology of yellow fever [in October, 1900]
div1.p:
Bldg in Indianapolis where Walter Reed read his
first paper on Y. F (The Preliminary Report)
Oct 23, 1900
